ing: 4 fresh peaches - peeled, pitted, and diced
n: Peach Salsa with Cilantro and Lime
des: "A sweet and tangy side dish that makes a great side dish, garnish, or party treat. The sugar helps a lot to bring out the flavor in the peaches while refrigerating."
ins: Mix peaches, onion, and cilantro together in a large bowl; drizzle with lime juice. Sprinkle salsa with sugar; toss to coat. Refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving.
